metadata.title: CVE-2019-1010054 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: Dolibarr 7.0.0 is affected by: Cross Site Request Forgery (CSRF). Theimpact is: allow malitious html to change user password, disable users anddisable password encryptation. The component is: Function User passwordchange, user disable and password encryptation. The attack vector is: adminaccess malitious urls.

criterions.comment: dolibarr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
